questions.question: What is the relationship between gender and religion in society?

options.A: Gender roles are influenced by religious beliefs.
options.B: Religion has no impact on gender roles.
options.C: Gender and religion are completely unrelated.
options.D: Only women are affected by religious beliefs.

questions.question: How do caste systems affect social dynamics in India?

options.C: They have no effect on society.
options.D: They are only relevant in rural areas.

questions.question: What role does religion play in shaping cultural identities?

options.B: It is a major factor in cultural identity.
options.D: Religion is only important in politics.
